title: Rebirth and Redemption - Novel Updates
tags: Bullying   Celebrities   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Early Romance   Famous Parents   Famous Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Second Chance   Seme Protagonist   Shy Characters   Writers
author: 祎庭沫瞳
description:
A campus bullying incident led Chu Feng to receive a message of Rong Xun’s suicide after ten years.

Rong Xun’s relic is a novel based on him…

At this point, he came to know that Rong Xun had always liked him.

In deep regret, Chu Feng returned back to high school.

This time, he wants to protect Rong Xun, his achievement and let him have a different life.

At first, he only wants to compensate for his mistakes but he didn’t know when his compensation becomes true love.>
